item.title: Checkpoint clash: Top cop defends road blocks, infuriating some MPs
item.description: VIRUS LATEST * 3.25 million cases worldwide, with 230,000 deaths - US death toll exceeds 60,000 * New Zealand has just 216 active cases - death toll remains 19 * MPs unanimously pass biggest tax support ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/PD240420NADKAIKOHE5_70x71.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Volunteers at an iwi-run Covid-19 checkpoint in Kaikohe last Friday. Community checkpoints will not be tolerated when the country moves to alert level 2, police have confirmed.Photo / Peter de Graaf

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/SCCZEN_A_JS230320NADCHECK_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=A volunteer talks to a motorist at the Waiomio checkpoint during lockdown while Hone Harawira waits in the background. Photo / John Stone

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/SCCZEN_A_PD160420NADKAIKOHE2_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Tai Tokerau Border Control waves to a motorist passing through the Kaikohe checkpoint. Photo / Peter de Graaf
https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/SCCZEN_A_PD160420NADKAIKOHE5_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Kaikohe checkpoint co-ordinator Jay Hepi. Photo / Peter de Graaf

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202018/SCCZEN_A_PD160420NADKAIKOHE3_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Social worker Kim Ellice talks to a motorist at the Kaikohe checkpoint run by Tai Tokerau Border Control. Photo / Peter de Graaf

item.title: 'I feel like a miracle': Woman who battled coronavirus while pregnant gives birth in a coma
item.description:
Angela Primachenko can't recall what her first thought was after waking up from a week-long coma.
The first two days were "very hazy". But when reality caught up, she realised that not only had she nearly ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz
